kpi.name: M1006C263

kpi_info.title: RRC CONN RELEASE LTE REDIR DUE TO CH TYPE SWITCH
kpi_info.use: The number of RRC Connection Releases triggered by Smart LTE Layering feature because of switch from HSPA to Rel99 DCH transport channels. Also M1006C24 is updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When the RNC sends RRC Connection Release message to the UE, triggered by Smart LTE Layering feature because of HS-DSCH to Rel99 DCH (DCH x/y) channel type switch. HS-DSCH switches directly to Rel99 DCH without any bit rate (DCH 0/0) are not included in this counter. The counter is be updated only once per RRC Connection Release procedure, not counting repeated messages sent by the RNC.

kpi.kpi_alias: RRC CONN RELEASE LTE REDIR DUE TO CH TYPE SWITCH
